verbs.description: [ARG0: Stormy Daniels] [V: made] [ARG1: an appearance on ‘ Saturday Night Live’] [ARGM-TMP: tonight] , [ARGM-ADV: appearing in a sketch in which she finally talks directly to Donald Trump] .
